metadata.title: USN-4276-1 -- Yubico PIV Tool vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that libykpiv, a supporting library of the Yubico PIV Tool and YubiKey PIV Manager, mishandled specially crafted input. An attacker with a custom-made, malicious USB device could potentially execute arbitrary code on a computer running the Yubico PIV Tool or Yubikey PIV Manager.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4276-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libykpiv-dev - 1.4.2-2ubuntu0.1 libykpiv1 - 1.4.2-2ubuntu0.1 ykcs11 - 1.4.2-2ubuntu0.1 yubico-piv-tool - 1.4.2-2ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
